 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁא‎</span>] ***forget***, see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁה‎</span>. below 

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁה‎</span>] **verb** ==forget== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nišîtu***</u></abbr> perhaps ***forgottenness*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 486</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְשָׁא‎</span> (especially Ithpe\`el, Aph\`el), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***forget***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***forget, neglect***; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ignoscere, condonare, indulgere*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>633</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָשִׁיתִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתְכֶם נָשׁאֹ‎</span> [[Jer.23.39|Jer 23:39]] ***I will forget you finally*** (but [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָשָׂאתִי‎</span>, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָטַשְׁתִּי‎</span> as v[[Jer.23.33|Jer 23:33]] b, see III.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשָּׂא‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשִׁיתִי טוֺבָה‎</span> [[Lam.3.17|Lam 3:17]] ***I have forgotten prosperity; Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַאֶשֶּׁה‎</span> ***shall I forget ?*** i.e. overlook, read by [[BDB#We|We]] [[Mic.6.10|Mic 6:10]] plausibly for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַאִשׁ‎</span>; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א) נָשׁאֹ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ל‎</span> [[Jer.23.39|Jer 23:39]] (see above). **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנָּשֵׁנִי‎</span> [[Isa.44.21|Isa 44:21]] ***thou shalt not be forgotten of me***, but dubious; [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:117»§ 117</sup>\* <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנְשֵׁנִי‎</span> (Qal); [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּטְּשֵׁנִי‎</span> (compare [[Deut.32.15|Deut 32:15]]). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַשַּׁ֫נִי‎</span> [[Gen.41.51|Gen 41:51]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***God hath made me forget*** + accusative of thing (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַ֯‎</span> in 1st syllable only here, influence of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַשֶּׁה‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:52m»§ 52m</sup>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשָּׁהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָכְמָה‎</span> [[Job.39.17|Job 39:17]] ***God caused her*** (the ostrich) ***to forget*** wisdom, i.e. did not endow her with it. ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשֶּׁה לְךָ מִןֿ‎</span> [[Job.11.6|Job 11:6]] Eloah ***allows a part of*** thy guilt ***to be forgotten thee***, i.e. does not reckon it to thee in full ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁוֶה לְךָ מֵאֱלוֺהַּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּעֲוֺנֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[[BDB#Du|Du]]] ***there is equivalent to thee from Eloah, according to thine iniquity***, compare [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Job and Solomon</sup>; [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׁה‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשֶּׁה‎</span>; [[BDB#Du|Du]] rejects ver. as gloss).
